Date: 2024-11-25 14:24
Subject: Christofle - Insurance Renewal - 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Pauline,


Hope all is well.

 

First of all, I would like to apologize for the delays from my end but it has been very hectic these past few months.

 

If possible, please let us have a call to align on the direction of the insurance renewal for 2025, the budget set, the new locations, etc…

 

Please let me know a convenient time for you, Chloe and Marion to have a call. Ideally, if we can set up a call for tomorrow or Wednesday, that would be great.

 

Look forward to hearing from you and hope you have a lovely day.

 

Best Regards,
Hagop

 

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
